mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER_AUTHLIST( MEMBER_AUTH_CODE, MEMBER_CODE) VALUES(1, SEQ_MEMBER_CODE.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: select M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PWD, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.REGIST_DATE, M.WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, M.ADULT_STATUS, TMA.MEMBER_CODE, TMA.MEMBER_AUTH_CODE, TM.MEMBER_AUTH_CODE, TM.MEMBER_AUTH_NAME, TM.MEMBER_AUTH_DESC, T.MEMBERSHIP_CODE, T.MEMBERSHIP_NAME, T.ACCRUAL_RATE, T.MEMBERSHIP_CONTENT, TA.ADDRESS_CODE, TA.ZIP_CODE, TA.BASE_ADDRESS, TA.DETAIL_ADDRESS from TBL_MEMBER M LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER_AUTHLIST TMA ON M.MEMBER_CODE = TMA.MEMBER_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBERAUTH TM on TMA.MEMBER_AUTH_CODE = TM.MEMBER_AUTH_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBERSHIP T on M.MEMBERSHIP_CODE = T.MEMBERSHIP_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_ADDRESS TA on M.MEMBER_CODE = TA.MEMBER_CODE WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{ userId }
